articles.title: YouTube's free games catalog 'Playables' rolls out to all users - TechCrunch
articles.description: YouTube's free Playables don't directly challenge the app store model or break Apple's rules. However, they do compete with the App Store's free games.
articles.content: YouTube’s “app store” for games is rolling out more broadly. The company announced on Tuesday that its collection of lightweight, free games dubbed “Playables” will soon start to appear in the YouTub… [+2468 chars]
